uk.ac.uea.mathsthing

Interface IFormula

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Formula

    public interface IFormula
    Provides the required methods for a representation of a mathematical formula.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jordan Woerner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFormula getDerivative()
      Gets the derivative for this IFormula.
      java.math.BigDecimal getResult()
      Processes the stored formula, evaluating a result for the formula.
      java.lang.String getXAxis()
      Gets the operand that represents the X axis on a graph.
      java.lang.String getYAxis()
      Gets the operand that represents the Y axis on a graph.
      void setParameters(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
      Sets the parameters that will be used when evaluating this IFormula.

        Sets the parameters that will be used when evaluating this IFormula.

      • getResult

        java.math.BigDecimal getResult()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Processes the stored formula, evaluating a result for the formula.
        Returns:
        Returns a BigDecimal representation of the result.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if there are any errors processing the stored formula.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDerivative

        IFormula getDerivative()
        Gets the derivative for this IFormula.
        Returns:
        Returns a new IFormula instance representing the derivative of this IFormula.
        Since:
        1.0
